forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High 21C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A good deal of sunshine. High around 70F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 13C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low around 55F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 18C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High near 65F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 17C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 63F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 63F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 11C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the evening, then cloudy overnight. Low 52F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 16C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 63F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 12C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 53F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening, then fog developing overnight. Low 51F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 64F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low near 10C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly cloudy conditions late. Low around 50F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 17C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 62F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low around 50F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High near 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening. Increasing clouds with periods of showers after midnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
